question:
Given the breadth and speed of social media, the only way celebrities can hope to conceal their foibles is by employing practices as ________ as those of a spy ring.
Two Answers
A. draconian
B. arduous
C. conspicuous
D. duplicitous
E. fanciful
F. cloaked
